MAN.TITLE: TCL_GetVar

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: varname : string character Contains the name of the tcl/tk variable.
value : may be a string character or a strings matrix contains the value of the tcl/tk variable 'varname'.

DESCRIPTION.P: When tcl/tk support is enabled in scilab, this routine can be used to retreive the value of a tcl/tk variable.
